ygData.subject: Re: New Topic, Languages!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: How do you start learning a new Language?  I have been around elves talking Elvish before, but noticed no skill gain or message. Tuannon Bristlebane ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
How do you start learning a new Language? I have been around elves talking
Elvish before, but noticed no skill gain or message.


Tuannon
Bristlebane


-----Original Message-----

Subject: [eqpaladin] Re: New Topic, Languages!!!


>From: "Ragnarok" <gvragnarok@...>

>Hmm... I know Common, Elvish, Tierdall, Old Erudian, Elder Tierdall, Gnoll,
>Lizardman, Gnomish, Dwarvish, and a few others I can't remember. The only
>one's I can truly understand are Common, Evlish, and Dwarvish.
>
>Tiresias
>Servant of Erollisi Marr
>
>Now if I can only memmorize that many languages in real life. =)
>
